name: Coconut
description: The name of my game is Coconut. It is about a delivery man that works for a shipping company that ships around the galaxy. It takes place in a futuristic universe where earth and other planets are interconnected by Earth’s portal technology. The player’s role in this game is that of the character themself. You make the choices in the game. The player had the option of just exploring the new planets while ignoring choices to explore the mysterious and vice versa so the experience you get depends on you.
